channel.title: Kelley Blue Book Latest News & Articles - Kelley Blue Book
channel.description: The latest automotive news and articles from Kelley Blue Book.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2017, Kelley Blue Book. All rights reserved.

item.title: 2017 Chevrolet Bolt EV First Drive
item.description: We’ve seen and heard plenty about the all-new 2017 Chevrolet Bolt during the past year.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Ford GT confirmed with 647 horsepower and 216 mph top speed
item.description: Ford has finally released official performance stats for its new GT supercar and the numbers are as stunning as the vehicle itself.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: Mitsubishi compact crossover SUV teased for Geneva debut
item.description: Mitsubishi Motors has confirmed that it will introduce a new compact SUV at the Geneva Auto Show in March.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 BMW 5 Series First Drive Review
item.description: These days when an all-new car model is introduced, what is unseen often makes a bigger splash than what is.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: Annual Awards
item.description: Our annual awards are among the most coveted in the industry because they're among the most valued by car shoppers.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2018 Mercedes-Benz E-Class Cabriolet First Look
item.description: Mercedes-Benz builds a lot of cars, a lot of sexy cars, a lot of which go topless.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: Cubic Telecom Introduces Next-gen SIM Technology
item.description: Embedded vehicle telematics are experiencing a modern-day renaissance.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2018 BMW 4 Series Updated
item.description: A selection of subtle enhancements are in store for the 2018 BMW 4 Series lineup, including the range-topping M4 models.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2018 Subaru XV Crosstrek Teased for Geneva Debut
item.description: The all-new 2018 Subaru XV Crosstrek will get its official coming out party at the Geneva Auto Show in March.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: This Week in Car Buying: Deals of the month; Inventories tighten
item.description: Auto makers are poised to offer deals on a wide range of vehicles from small hatchbacks to popular crossover SUVs in this month’s top 10 deals compiled by Kelley Blue Book.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Shelby 50th Anniversary Super Snake Unveiled
item.description: Marking a half-century of building high performance Ford Mustangs, Shelby American has unveiled the 50th Anniversary Super Snake.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: Dendrobium Concept EV Teased for Geneva
item.description: The latest hypercar preparing to surface is the electric-power Dendrobium Concept, which is set to bow at the Geneva Auto Show.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Ford F-150 Buyer's Guide
item.description: When word started to spread that Ford was building its next F-150 out of aluminum, the truck world got nervous.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Kia Cadenza Limited Long-Term Introduction
item.description: It’s no secret that crossover SUVs are gaining popularity at the expense of traditional 4-door sedans, but if the 2017 Kia Cadenza that was recently added to the Kelley Blue Book long-term fleet is any indication, there’s still plenty of life left in the concept of a family-sized sedan.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2018 Mini John Cooper Works Countryman Unveiled
item.description: Filling out the new Mini Countryman family line, the range-topping 2018 Mini John Cooper Works Countryman has been revealed and detailed before its public debut in April at the Shanghai Motor Show.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Genesis G80 Buyer's Guide
item.description: Once known as the Hyundai Genesis, the Genesis G80 is now part of a full luxury line Just as Toyota did with Lexus, Hyundai has developed its own upscale brand: Genesis.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 7 Tips on Having the Right Car Insurance Coverage
item.description: Having the right insurance when purchasing a new car is an important decision.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Honda Accord Hybrid Long-Term Update: Powertrain
item.description: With four months under its belt, our 2017 Honda Accord Hybrid EX-L Touring has proven a solid addition to the KBB.com long-term vehicle fleet, thanks to its laudable mix of comfort, utility and efficiency.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2018 Ford Mustang Updated
item.description: A comprehensive mid-cycle refresh of the 2018 Ford Mustang adds coolness and capability to the automaker’s original pony car.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Chevrolet Traverse Buyer's Guide
item.description: Big and Cozy for the Whole Family -- and Soon to be All-New The Chevrolet Traverse crossover is what you'd get if a full-size SUV sold the boat, settled down and had a family.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: KBB.com Awards and 10 Best Lists
item.description: Your Shortcut to the Right Vehicle It seems every new vehicle we drive is both more powerful and more fuel-efficient than its predecessor.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: Midsize SUV Buyer's Guide
item.description: If you need three rows of seats but don't want a big, thirsty full-size SUV, and aren't ready to succumb to the utter domestication of a minivan, welcome to the midsize SUV market.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Toyota Prius C Freshened
item.description: Adding visual and functional appeal to the automaker’s most affordable hybrid, the 2017 Toyota Prius C rolls into showrooms sporting a bolder look and moving several previously optional driver-assist features as standard equipment.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: Mercedes-AMG Teases Project One Hypercar
item.description: Following up on what it had only hinted at during a presentation at the CES show in Las Vegas, Mercedes-AMG offered some insight at the North American International Auto Show regarding what we can expect to see in its upcoming street-legal, ultra-high-performance hypercar being developed as “Project One.” Stating that “it marks the pinnacle of what is currently technologically feasible,” Tobias Moers, Chairman of the Board of Management of Mercedes-AMG GmbH, notes this benchmark vehicle “points the way to AMG Future Performance.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: This Week in Car Buying: Incentives get selective
item.description: As 2017 gets underway, car buyers will be seeing fewer large scale sales events and more selective incentives as manufacturers look to balance inventories by strategically placing spiffs on slower selling products.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Consumer Electronics Show: Video Roundup
item.description: The 2017 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas is almost as much about the future of the automobile as it is about the everyday digital devices in our lives.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2018 Dodge Challenger SRT Demon Teased For NY Debut
item.description: Those who found themselves wanting more than what was on offer in the Dodge SRT Hellcat models will have their wishes come true this April.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 North American Car, Truck and Utility Vehicle Winners Announced
item.description: An EV, minivan and midsize pickup took top honors at the 2017 North American Car, Truck and Utility Vehicle Awards.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: 2017 Ford GT: Digital dash revealed
item.description: While there’s no shortage of hard facts about the overall design of the new 2017 Ford GT, the automaker has held back on specific details about one aspect of its new supercar.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)

item.title: Tesla Taps Apple Engineer
item.description: Tesla announced that Chris Lattner has joined its company as the Vice President of Autopilot Software.
item.author: kelley@kbb.com (Kelley Blue Book)
